sense.name: Write by means of a keyboard with types.
sense.commentary: Includes: TYPE UP, TYPE OUT, TYPE IN
sense.examples: John can type 500 words per minute. I'll type this up for the meeting this afternoon. Please type in your name and social security number. Type out the letters carefully; we don't want any errors.

sense.name: Identify as belonging to a certain category.
sense.examples: We could type such people as paranoid or delusional. Don't type me that way!
